alldb.table_sql: SELECT P.ID, PROJ_ID AS PROJID, P.EQUIP_NAME AS EQUIPNAME, P.GUARANTOR, C.CUST_NAME AS GUARANTORNAME, P.EQUIP_INVOICE AS EQUIPINVOICE, P.GUARANTYVALUE, P.PRESENT_VALUE AS PRESENTVALUE, P.EQUIP_GUARANTEE_TYPE AS EQUIPGUARANTEETYPE, DICT1.NAME_ AS EQUIPGUARANTEETYPENAME, P.TOTAL_PRICE AS TOTALPRICE, DICT2.NAME_ AS NOTARYFLAGNAME, P.NOTARY_FLAG AS NOTARYFLAG, P.RECORD_MECH AS RECORDMECH, P.PURCHASE_LIFE AS PURCHASELIFE, P.CGENOTE AS CGENOTE FROM PROJ_GUARANTEE_EQUIP P LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO C ON P.GUARANTOR = C.ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT1 ON P.EQUIP_GUARANTEE_TYPE = DICT1.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT2 ON P.NOTARY_FLAG = DICT2.ID_ WHERE P.PROJ_ID = '{proj_id}'
